User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow protected/private areas
Disallow: /auth/
Disallow: /profile
Disallow: /subscription
Disallow: /consultation
Disallow: /results/
Disallow: /admin/

# Allow important public pages
Allow: /login
Allow: /signup
Allow: /pricing
Allow: /contact
Allow: /blogs
Allow: /about
Allow: /privacy
Allow: /terms
Allow: /cookies

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://codeopt.ai/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional - helps with server load)
Crawl-delay: 1
